description: Enables a control on a specified target.

ControlIdentifier.markdownDescription:
Arn of the control.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 20  

Maximum Length: 2048  

Pattern: ^arn:aws[0-9a-zA-Z_\-:\/]+$  

Update requires: No interruption

TargetIdentifier.description: Arn for Organizational unit to which the control needs to be applied
TargetIdentifier.markdownDescription:
Arn for Organizational unit to which the control needs to be applied

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 20  

Maximum Length: 2048  

Pattern: ^arn:aws[0-9a-zA-Z_\-:\/]+$  

Update requires: No interruption
